alert.note: Alert for Eureka (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 5:11PM PDT until August 11 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada, northeast Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following counties, in north central Nevada, Eureka. In northeast Nevada, White Pine. In south central Nevada, Nye. * WHEN...Until 815 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 511 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cockalorum Wash, Fish Creek, Cedar Creek, Antelope Wash, Faulkner Creek, Sullivan Wash, South Fork Allison Creek, Fenstermaker Wash, Dagget Creek, Hot Spring Wash and Spring Valley. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Eureka, Southwestern White Pine and Nye Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
